item.title: Healthcare Shortages: A Global Problem
item.description: Healthcare Shortages: A Global Problem The world is facing a growing shortage of healthcare workers. This shortage is impacting countries of all income levels, and it is having a significant impact on the quality and availability of care. There are a number of factors contributing to the global healthcare shortage.
